revised_title: The Anatomy of Plants: Exploring the Structure and Function of Plant Parts
tldr: The author, Nehemiah Grew, presents a detailed study of plant anatomy, focusing on the structure, function, and growth of various plant parts. The book covers the anatomy of seeds, roots, trunks, branches, leaves, flowers, and fruits, providing insights into plant reproduction, vegetation, and the role of different parts in plant life. The text also includes a method for identifying plants based on their leaves and flowers.
